website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek the large screen format without the plasma or 4K price point, this is the one to consider first. We recommend installing a soundbar, however.
pros: Many popular apps and programs included
Smart features easy to set up
cons: Some complaints of lag time and motion blur
Problem with some sound source connections

customer_reviews.title: Set up was a breeze So far so good The clarity is great
customer_reviews.text: Got it 2days ago so thats why the 4 stars.. Set up was a breeze So far so good The clarity is great! Love it.. !
customer_reviews.author: jR

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my Samsung television
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Samsung television. The pictures are quite sharp and clear and it was delivered In a very short time. We will definitely be buying Samsung again. Yours very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... one for the bedroom because I have one just like it in the living area
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for the bedroom because I have one just like it in the living area. it's a great TV and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pattiloveslife

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Nice picture and sound. Need to hook fire stick up and will see from there.
customer_reviews.author: Tags

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE NOW.
customer_reviews.text: I was so blown away by this TV. Picture was very clear and the set up couldn't have been easier. Simply turn it on and point to your home router and it's off to the races. Samsung hit it out of the park on this one.
customer_reviews.author: jeffswert

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture and great
customer_reviews.text: Tv came on time with no damage. Clear picture and great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My TV has beautiful color and performs like I expected
customer_reviews.text: My TV has beautiful color and performs like I expected. It was delivered right to my front door. I've had it about a year or more with no problems. Love it, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: All to the good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good TV. Picture was great from the start and the setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Using the remote is a bit cumbesom
customer_reviews.author: Herman C Lee

customer_reviews.title: I have no use for the smart features so can't comment on that
customer_reviews.text: I have no use for the smart features so can't comment on that. All I need is a TV and this fits the bill perfectly. The over the air reception is very good and the picture quality is exceptional. The 4K's have nothing on this TV as 1080p is the best resolution that's available anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa's 62

customer_reviews.title: Ok monitor...
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it to work full screen for my flight simulator.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: I originally ordered a 55" Samsung with a 240 motion ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a 55" Samsung with a 240 motion rate but that TV was damaged. I was sent a replacement 55"TV which has a 120 motion rate not exactly the same. Everything else was the same.
customer_reviews.author: SueMeme

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tv but not what was missing some things it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not advertise all the correct information. It's a great tv but not what was missing some things it said it had.
customer_reviews.author: guy landis

customer_reviews.title: Mother board problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV in Feb 2015 and now it no longer works!! No picture or sound and one month shy for the warranty! No one will step up to the plate. Did some research and it looks like the Mother board needs to be replaced, all this after 2 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele M

product_meta.title: Samsung UN55J620DAFXZA 55'' Class 1080p 120 Motion Rate Smart LED HDTV
product_meta.description: With the Samsung Smart LED TV, “Smart” is only the beginning. Navigate effortlessly through the Samsung Smart TV to find your favorite shows, movies, sports and games. Go beyond watching TV and check out the latest YouTube hits, entertainment news or do some online shopping with full web browsing capabilities. See it all with greater picture quality, including a wider spectrum of colors with the Wide Color Enhancer. Enjoy improved fast-action moving picture resolution at Motion Rate 120 with outstanding refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology. The screen mirroring feature allows you to mirror your phone onto the TV's screen wirelessly instead of your device's smaller screen for showing content, media playback, or other function.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
